articles.description: The Tanner sisters had a cousin make a cameo on this series. Turns out, he is actually Candace Cameron Bure's brother. Here's what we know about Kirk Cameron's 'Full House' character.
articles.content: Oh, Mylanta! This character had a few friends on the popular 1990s sitcom, Full House, one of which was actually her brother in real life, Kirk Cameron. Heres what we know about these two actors and … [+2964 chars]
